channel.title: Running client error... Please help
channel.description:
Title says it... I got an error while trying to run the client. I had edited some stuff, nothing much, no code, just some names.... It came up with this is in the cmd.
[code] PKingKingScape Client Error: loaderror Starting up 20 urlstream Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4644) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:140) at client.run(client.java:4424) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Also, when i spawn a void top in my server, it comes up as a 'toy horsey' lol, anyone know how to fix it?? BTW; it does the same thing when u buy full void from pc, so it is not a spawning thing, it is something to do with model I think... Thanks :D

item.title: Running client error... Please help
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

Go into your class8.java file in your client folder and search for “Void knight top” and you should see something like this,

if(i == 2520) <------ this is the item id that you need to spawn for the correct model. { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = -22464; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 4550; class8.anInt174 = 7215; class8.anInt181 = 919; class8.anInt190 = 459; class8.anInt204 = 138; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 3; class8.anInt165 = 7218; class8.anInt188 = 7217; class8.anInt200 = 7219; class8.anInt164 = 7220; class8.anInt166 = 63; class8.anInt173 = 120; class8.aString170 = "Void Knight Top"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Void Knight Top".getBytes(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Running client error... Please help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Title says it…
I got an error while trying to run the client. I had edited some stuff, nothing much, no code, just some names…
It came up with this is in the cmd.

PKingKingScape Client
Error: loaderror Starting up 20
urlstream
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.method8(client.java:4644)
        at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146)
        at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:140)
        at client.run(client.java:4424)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Also, when i spawn a void top in my server, it comes up as a ‘toy horsey’ lol, anyone know how to fix it?? BTW; it does the same thing when u buy full void from pc, so it is not a spawning thing, it is something to do with model I think…
Thanks
